They appreciate its beauty, color accuracy, and zipper design, with one highlighting the front zipper and side pockets. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for an affordable cost
items.body: Absolutely love these! I got one in black and had to order other colors because I liked it so much. Very comfortable, nice soft breathable fabric. Has a really good fit, somewhat shaped unlike many that have 0 waist line or flow but still very modest without revealing actual body shape. Very high quality for the cost! Read more
items.author: Seraiah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for umrah
items.body: Bought this abaya in almost every color and size (including the kids version) for our familyâ€™s umrah trip. Fit is great, nice fall, functional pockets, doesn't wrinkle, washes well. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Nida

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real soft and pretty color/perfect for summers
items.body: This Abaya is Beautiful and surprisingly soft and flowy ( i would think perfect for Umrah/Hajj inshAllah). It runs a little long though so please be mindful of the size but having said that the customer service for the times we are in was OUT of this world.. i was almost in tears. Ps.. if Surprise. IT has a pocket.. if the size suits you, Don't think twice UPDATED:I wanted to contact the seller but this maybe better. Before anything else let me begin with the fact that I love the cool color and material perfect for summers. I had some sizing issue and the seller was wondeful at helping make it right.. I wanted to let them know that i Alhamdulillah got to wear the abaya at Hajj 2025 and it worked perfectly. I keep coming back to it due to the color, soft fabric, easy front open zip and best of all POCKETS, ðŸ˜Š. This runs a little long so just be mindful of that when ordering. It is wide enuff to accommodate some of us fluffy ones without having to go up in size. Im 5'2 and xl is touching the floor Read more
items.author: Ziddibilli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT ABAYA
items.body: PERFECT rich color, it's flowy and well made, zipper is nice and heavy, it's overlocked, they've used the fabric generously. The price is VERY reasonable compared to the other one I got. The fabric is the perfect thickness, the sleeves have a comfortable elastic. There are pockets to keep a tasbeeh or briefly storing your phone for quick access during commute. I am 5'1 and small framed so it's longer than I'd like on me and they didn't have the maroon in xsmall so I got it in small so it's not their fault. I may exchange it with xsmall blue so it won't be too long to wear for Umrah! I have no complaints whatsoever! Read more
items.author: Amazonian63

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric
items.body: Nice fabric. I feel comfortable in it and it is wide enough to be modest Read more
items.author: Y K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A decent somewhat sheer abaya.
items.body: The navy blue one looked very nice on my 89 yo mom. She likes it very much. It is somewhat sheer however so be prepared with an undergarment. Read more
items.author: Pamela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and perfect fit
items.body: The garment is a great summer piece. Very cool and comfortable. The garment fits me perfect. I am 5ft 2â€ I usually wear a medium size and it fit perfect in size and length. I would definitely offer more in every color. Read more
items.author: Khadijah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pockets

items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Brown, Khaki, White, Blue, Royal Blue, Mauve, Black, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
